summary: A mentally unstable photo developer targets a middle-class family after his obsession with them becomes more sick and disturbing than any of them could imagine.
cast: Robin Williams|Connie Nielsen|Michael Vartan|Dylan Smith|Erin Daniels|Paul Hansen Kim|Lee Garlington|Gary Cole|Marion Calvert|David Moreland|Shaun P. O'Hagan|Jim Rash|Nick Searcy|Dave Engfer|Jimmy Shubert|Eriq La Salle|Clark Gregg|Andy Rolfes|Carmen Mormino|Izrel Katz|Peter Mackenzie|Andy Comeau|Robert Clotworthy|Jesse Borja|Jeana Wilson|Megan Corletto|Kenneth Dixon|Noah Forrest|Anne Kathleen Murphy|Kristin Quick|Mark Romanek|Wayne Wilderson
title: Retratos de una obsesión
